scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npx lerna clean -y && npm run clean-root && npm run clean-cache
scripts.clean-root: npm ci --no-workspaces # install only packages needed by root package.json
scripts.clean-dist: npx lerna exec --no-bail 'npm run --if-present clean || rm -rf dist *.tsbuildinfo || true' && npm run clean-cache # remove built files
scripts.clean-package-locks: rm -f package-lock.json && npx lerna exec --no-bail 'rm -f package-lock.json'
